definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to appear/to arise/to emerge/to show up
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate

sentences.english: “We have done this every June for nineteen years, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 每年逢六月，我们这样做，现已经有十九年了。

sentences.english: Now his focus is the research of "Activity Results of 'Vitalization of Elders'".
sentences.chinese: 现着重于“‘激活老年人’的活动效果”研究。

sentences.english: In 771 B. C, the capital was moved eastward to Luoyang in present-day Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 公元前771年，周的首都东迁到了现河南省的洛阳。

sentences.english: He is the highest ranking White House official convicted of felony in years.
sentences.chinese: 他是现白宫高级官员这些年被判重刑最严重的人员。

sentences.english: Primary coverage of urban water distribution system is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 现介绍了城市给水系统优化调度的主要内容。

sentences.english: John got sick last January and has been in bed since then.
sentences.chinese: 约翰于去年一月染疾，现仍卧病不起。

sentences.english: Shandong Provincial Hospital now has 74 clinical and medical science departments.
sentences.chinese: 山东省立医院现设有74个临床和医技科室。

sentences.english: The optimal management of femoral fractures in adolescents is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 对于青少年股骨骨折的最佳治疗现仍存在争议。

sentences.english: In addition, tour lines to India have been stopped.
sentences.chinese: 此外，各旅行社现也已叫停了前往印度的各条旅游线。

sentences.english: Presently bestselling inside and out of province, sells in distant markets of Macao, soon infiltrates the international market.
sentences.chinese: 现畅销省内外，远销澳门，即将打入国际市场。

sentences.english: After reform and restructuring is, the sequence is more.
sentences.chinese: 现经过改革改制，属于多经序列。

sentences.english: She graduated with Master degree in major vocal pedagogy from Northeaster Illinois University in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 现获得东北伊利诺州立大学声乐教学法硕士学位。

sentences.english: We write to introduce ourselves as large dealers in foodstuffs with good connections in the country.
sentences.chinese: 现函告，我方为食品大经销商，在国内拥有大批客户。

sentences.english: Bustards are now associated with the Badger MK II for invention purposes as the BPC requirement.
sentences.chinese: 大鸨级飞船现作为獾级蓝图II的发明要求。

sentences.english: Now we will make designs for lower cutting installation to solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 现通过设计低割装置来解决这个问题。

sentences.english: The procession has turned onto Lianyue Rd. Too bad Lian Yue's not here.
sentences.chinese: 现队伍转入莲岳路，可惜连岳不在。

definition: to hold an office or post
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
to close/to stop/to put a stop to sth/cut-off point/stopping point/deadline
early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
